item.title: What It Means To Be A Porn Addict
item.description: I’m a pornography addict and quite frankly, it sucks. I decided to write this article in order to provide some closure into what happens in my mind when I go full addict. Because even though it’s an issue most men face and widely accept, I personally believe it’s not okay. So rather than brush it over, I’m choosing to address it for the betterment of myself and society. As always, addiction is an incredibly intimate and personal experience that touches us all in different ways.
